attributes.action: Increase Political Education in UK Schools
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this e-petition to increase political education in schools. This will hopefully:
1) Increase voter turnout;
2) Ensure voters know what they are voting for; and
3) Make educated public opinions heard.

Parliament doesn't take advantage and target younger people, who will be voting in under six years.

To increase political knowledge would be to change the direction of politics in this country altogether. Be part of that change, and sign the petition!
